body.name: ACCENTHOME Natural Cotton Linen Napkin Set of 12 18x18 inch Dinner Napkins - Washable Soft Premium Hotel Quality Reusable Napkins Perfect Table Napkins for Family Dinners, Weddings
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 17 hrs 48 mins
features: PURE HANDMADE COTTON NAPKINS – This is a delicate handmade cloth napkin, and each napkin takes a lot of time to make, requiring hand-pulling cotton threads on all four sides to get 0.8 inches of fringe. These dinner napkins are soft and absorbent, quick drying, and high in quality! These durable napkins are an eco-friendly alternative to paper napkins & towels.

ECONOMY PACK: – Tailored with Mitered corners and a generous hem, our cloth linen napkins came in a value Pack of 12 Pieces measuring 18 by 18 inches each. These cloth napkins packs gives you convince of buying table napkins set in a single package rather than purchasing each item separately.

MULTI PURPOSE USE: ACCENTHOME's excellent durable hotel quality linen napkins are best for use both in business or home settings; these are brilliant as hotel napkins, wedding napkins, restaurant napkins, banquet table napkins, family dinner napkins, cocktail napkins and as party table napkins. These cloth napkins are carefully cut and sewn with mitted corners which give them an elegant look as your table napkins.
MACHINE WASHABLE – Easy to maintain, these durable dinner napkins can be machine washed multiple times in cold water, without having their color fade!

QUALITY IS OUR CULTURE – We crafted our product with extreme care for absolute customers satisfaction. We are confident with the quality of our products. If you are unsatisfied, feel free to contact us at any time!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A Sustainable Choice: By choosing our cotton linen napkins, you're making an environmentally responsible decision. Materials and sustainable practices, these napkins allow you to enjoy luxurious table decor while contributing to a greener planet. Personalize Your Moments: Embrace your creativity and personalize your table decor with our cotton linen napkins. Fold them into artistic shapes or pair them with charming napkin rings to add a touch of your unique style to each dining experience. Make Every Occasion Special: From formal dinners to casual luncheons, our cotton linen napkins turn every occasion into something extraordinary. Elevate your table decor and create cherished memories with loved ones around a table adorned with timeless elegance. Unleash the Art of Tablescaping: Our cotton linen napkins are an essential element of your tablescaping journey. Combine them with elegant dinnerware, chic centerpieces, and soft candlelight to create breathtaking table arrangements that will captivate and inspire your guests

Why choose us? Versatility Redefined: Our cotton linen napkins are incredibly versatile, complementing a wide range of table settings and themes. Whether you're hosting a rustic-inspired dinner party, a chic modern brunch, or an intimate family gathering, our napkins seamlessly adapt to suit your unique style. A Feast for the Senses: Experience the sensory delight of our cotton linen napkins as they gently caress your skin. The premium fabric's softness ensures a delightful tactile experience, making every meal a true feast for your senses.

Luxurious Comfort of Cotton Linen Fabric Discover the perfect blend of natural elegance and unbeatable comfort with our premium cotton linen fabric collection. Crafted from the finest fibers, our cotton linen fabric is a testament to timeless sophistication and enduring quality. Unmatched Sophistication Crafted from a luxurious blend of cotton and linen, our napkins exude a sense of refined sophistication. The natural texture and soft drape of the fabric elevate your table setting, adding an air of elegance to any occasion, from casual gatherings to formal celebrations. Easy Care for Effortless Elegance Our cotton linen napkins are not only elegant but also practical. Machine-washable and designed for easy care, they maintain their impeccable appearance even after repeated use. Embrace the joy of effortless elegance with our low-maintenance napkins.

Versatility and Customization One of the key advantages of using multiple colors and designs on cushion covers is the versatility it offers. Different color combinations can be selected to suit specific themes, moods, or personal preferences. Likewise, the choice of patterns and designs can be tailored to reflect individual styles or to harmonize with the existing décor elements in a room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These napkins will be used for basket liners for Christmas gifts. I am going to embroider on them but they are beautiful on their own. I was actually surprised at the nice quality and will definitely order more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice napkin, especially for machine embroidery.
reviews.reviewText: Nice napkins, however the “Stone” color is more of a beige toward a fawn color. Very nice for machine embroidering!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: These are pretty nice, however, as other reviews stated, the lace-finished edges aren't perfect. Each of the 12 could use some touched up stitching where it appears frayed. And I may do that some day if I find time. Also, they are cotton and linen, so yes, they need to be ironed. Having said that, my friend spilled red wine during Thanksgiving dinner and another friend used her napkin to clean up! I sprayed it and my new tablecloth with Shout, soaked the tablecloth and the used napkins in some non chlorine bleach solution, and washed all in hot water. Everything came out perfect! So I was pretty pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for embroidery
reviews.reviewText: Elegant fabric. Beautiful for making Christmas napkins as gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Wrinkles, Wrinkles, Wrinkles steam, starch, iron twice still Wrinkles.
reviews.reviewText: These napkins washed up really badly you have to steam and starch just to get them almost wrinkle free.Returned. They were so bad like a rag

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I use these to decorate my table daily. I don't actually allow them to be used, so I cannot attest to how useful they are. For my needs, they are beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple and Cute
reviews.reviewText: Great deal for what I was looking for. My package appeared to have been a return because some napkins arrived loose in the bag. Looks pretty and does the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Right packaging, wrong item
reviews.reviewText: So we ordered these for our Thanksgiving dinner. We were super excited for these napkins and the Navy color would match perfect for our theme. Surprisingly, all the packaging and labels listed the correct info but the napkins inside were definitely not Navy, They we’re still pretty napkins, but not what I wanted. Was able to get a replacement shipped, just hoping they arrive on time and are the correct color this time!
